response.overview: Dracula, Mavis, Johnny and the rest of the Drac Pack take a vacation on a luxury Monster Cruise Ship, where Dracula falls in love with the ship’s captain, Ericka, who’s secretly a descendant of Abraham Van Helsing, the notorious monster slayer.
response.tagline: He's going to need a vacation after this vacation.
response.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
